name: Sp3llCaster
description:
CONTROLS
WASD
Q FIREBALL
E MISSILE ROCKETS

You play as Carter, a mage with elemental powers in a blocked off envoirment, try to survive a wave of undead souls trapped inside cubes 

made for the GeoJam gamejam

known bugs:

the player may stick to walls
AI can push the player inside or thru walls
if the player jumps continuously the AI somewhat gets confused
If stuck to walls (in the air or on the ground) the AI often can't see the player
